trans-unit.source: A secure and interoperable binding that derives from <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding"></xref> and supports federated security.
trans-unit.target: Um enlace seguro e interoperável que derive <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding"> </xref> e suporta segurança federada.

trans-unit.source: Federation is the ability to share identities across multiple enterprises or trust domains for authentication and authorization.
trans-unit.target: Federação é a capacidade de partilhar identidades em várias empresas ou a domínios de confiança para autenticação e autorização.

trans-unit.source: It uses the WS-Trust protocol to map the identity representation from one trust domain to another.
trans-unit.target: Utiliza o protocolo WS-Trust para mapear a representação de identidade do domínio de confiança para outro.

trans-unit.source: Federated HTTP binding supports SOAP security as well as mixed-mode security, but it does not support transport security.
trans-unit.target: Enlace de HTTP federado suporta segurança SOAP, bem como de segurança de modo misto, mas não suporta a segurança de transporte.

trans-unit.source: Services configured with this binding must use the HTTP transport.
trans-unit.target: Serviços configurados com este enlace tem de utilizar o transporte HTTP.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When calling a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service built with.Net Framework 4.0 from a WCF client application built with [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] or earlier, the configuration file generated by svcutil.exe or adding a service reference from [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] will contain the establishSecurityContext attribute in the binding configuration.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ao chamar um [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] serviço criado with.Net Framework 4.0 partir de uma aplicação de cliente WCF criada com [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] ou anterior, o ficheiro de configuração gerado pelo svcutil.exe ou adicionar uma referência de serviço do [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] irá conter o atributo establishSecurityContext na configuração do enlace.

trans-unit.source: This attribute is not recognized by the [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] runtime and the application will thrown an <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> with the message "Unrecognized attribute establishSecurityContext".
trans-unit.target: Este atributo não é reconhecido pelo [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] tempo de execução e a aplicação será emitida uma <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException>com a mensagem "establishSecurityContext de atributo não reconhecido".</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException>

trans-unit.source: To workaround this problem, remove the establishSecurityContext attribute from the binding configuration.
trans-unit.target: Para resolver este problema, remova o atributo establishSecurityContext da configuração de enlace.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007FederationHttpBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007FederationHttpBinding"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The details of these settings are available from the instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp> that is returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os detalhes destas definições estão disponíveis na instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>que é devolvido pelo <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007FederationHttpBinding"></xref> class with a specified type of security used by the binding.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007FederationHttpBinding"> </xref> classe com um tipo de segurança utilizado pelo enlace especificado.

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> is <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> which specifies that integrity, confidentiality, and server and client authentication are provided using SOAP message security.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido de <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>é <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>que especifica que a autenticação de integridade, confidencialidade e o servidor e cliente são fornecidos com a segurança de mensagens SOAP.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The details of these settings are available from the instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp> that is returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os detalhes destas definições estão disponíveis na instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>que é devolvido pelo <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref> that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"> </xref> que especifica o tipo de segurança que é utilizado com a mensagem SOAP e para o cliente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007FederationHttpBinding"></xref> class with a binding specified by its configuration name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007FederationHttpBinding"> </xref> classe com um enlace especificado pelo respetivo nome de configuração.

trans-unit.source: The binding configuration name for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WS2007HttpBindingElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome de configuração de enlace para o <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WS2007HttpBindingElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The binding element with the name configurationName was not found.
trans-unit.target: O elemento de enlace com o nome configurationName não foi encontrado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007FederationHttpBinding"></xref> class with a specified type of security used by the binding and a value that indicates whether a reliable session is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007FederationHttpBinding"> </xref> classe com um tipo especificado de segurança utilizado pelo enlace e um valor que indica se uma sessão fiável está ativada.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref> that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"> </xref> que especifica o tipo de segurança que é utilizado com a mensagem SOAP e para o cliente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a reliable session is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se estiver ativada uma sessão fiável; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> using the settings provided by this instance.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>utilizando as definições fornecidas por esta instância.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> using the settings provided by this instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>utilizando as definições fornecidas por esta instância.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>
